unit.name: Vampire Count
unit.description: Rea: 1, single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Autonomous, Awaken (Zombies), Fear, Fearless, Undead, Vampiric (6+)

unit.name: Vampire Courtier
unit.description: Rea: 1, single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Autonomous, Awaken (Zombies), Fear, Fearless, Undead, Vampiric (6+)

unit.name: Necromancer
unit.description: Rea: 1, single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20, Awaken (Skeletons, Zombies), Fearless, Gates of the Netherworld, Undead

unit.name: Barrow King
unit.description: Rea: 1, single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Ashes to Ashes, Fearless, Not a Leader, Undead, Unliving Shield, Heavy Armour, Shield, Lethal Strike, Magical Attacks, Multiple Wounds (2, against Standard)

unit.name: Fell Wraith
unit.description: Rea: 1, single model, 0-3 Models/Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Ashes to Ashes, Fear, Fearless, Ghostly Form, Light Troops, Not a Leader, Terror, Undead, Aegis (3+, against non-Magical Attacks), Aegis (5+), Reaper

unit.name: Banshee
unit.description: Rea: 1, single model, 0-3 Models/Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Ashes to Ashes, Fear, Fearless, Ghostly Form, Light Troops, Not a Leader, Terror, Undead, Aegis (3+, against non-Magical Attacks), Aegis (5+), Reaper, Wail of Woe

unit.name: Zombies
unit.description: Rea: 2D6+4, 20-80 models, 0-4 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Ashes to Ashes, Fearless, Scoring, Undead

unit.name: Skeletons
unit.description: Rea: D6+4, 20-60 models, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Ashes to Ashes, Fearless, Scoring, Undead, Light Armour, Shield

unit.name: Ghouls
unit.description: Rea: D6+4, 10-40 models, 0-4 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Ashes to Ashes, Fearless, First Raised, Scoring, Undead, Poison Attacks, Unholy Appetite

unit.name: Bat Swarms
unit.description: Rea: D6+4, 2-10 models, 0-4 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Beast, Base 40x40 mm, Ashes to Ashes, Fearless, Fly (6", 12"), Light Troops, Skirmisher, Storm of Wings, Undead, Distracting, Hard Target (1)

unit.name: Dire Wolves
unit.description: Rea: D3+4, 5-15 models, 0-5 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Beast, Base 25x50 mm, Ashes to Ashes, Fearless, Undead, Vanguard, Devastating Charge (+1 Str, +1 AP)

unit.name: Great Bats
unit.description: Rea: D3+1, 2-9 models, 0-4 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Beast, Base 40x40 mm, Ashes to Ashes, Fearless, Fly (9", 18"), Light Troops, Skirmisher, Undead, Hard Target (1)

unit.name: Ghasts
unit.description: Rea: D3+1, 3-10 models, 0-5 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Infantry, Base 40x40 mm, Ashes to Ashes, Fear, Fearless, Undead, Fortitude (5+), Poison Attacks, Unholy Appetite

unit.name: Barrow Guard
unit.description: Rea: D3+4, 15-40 models, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Ashes to Ashes, Bodyguard (General, Barrow King), Fearless, Scoring, Undead, Heavy Armour, Lethal Strike, Magical Attacks, Multiple Wounds (2, against Standard)

unit.name: Barrow Knights
unit.description: Rea: D3+2, 5-15 models, 0-4 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base 25x50 mm, Ashes to Ashes, Fearless, Ghost Step, Scoring, Undead, Heavy Armour, Shield, Barrow Knight: Lethal Strike, Magical Attacks, Multiple Wounds (2, against Standard), Lance, Skeletal Steed: Harnessed, Magical Attacks

unit.name: Cadaver Wagon
unit.description: Rea: 2, single model, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Construct, Base 60x100 mm, Ashes to Ashes, Fearless, Necromantic Aura, No Rest for the Wicked, Not a Leader, Undead, War Platform, Fortitude (4+), Shambling Horde: Harnessed, Chassis: Impact Hits (1), Inanimate

unit.name: Dark Coach
unit.description: Rea: 1, single model, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Construct, Base 50x100 mm, Fear, Fearless, Ghost Step, Swiftstride, Undead, Unholy Conduit, Aegis (4+), Coachman: Magical Attacks, Great Weapon, Vampire: Vampiric (3+), Undead Mount (2): Harnessed, Chassis: Impact Hits (D6+1), Inanimate

unit.name: Court of the Damned
unit.description: Rea: 1, single model, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Construct, Base 60x100 mm, Chill of the Grave, Fear, Fearless, Ghost Step, Not a Leader, Towering Presence, Undead, War Platform, Paramour (3): Vampiric (6+), Spectral Pallbearers: Harnessed, Magical Attacks, Chassis: Impact Hits (D6), Inanimate

unit.name: Altar of Undeath
unit.description: Rea: 1, single model, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Construct, Base 50x100 mm, Ashes to Ashes, Fear, Fearless, Ghost Step, Lash of Souls, Swiftstride, Terror, Towering Presence, Undead, Fortitude (4+), Dark Conductor: Aura of Undeath, Ghost Steeds: Harnessed, Magical Attacks, Chassis: Impact Hits (D6), Inanimate

unit.name: Phantom Hosts
unit.description: Rea: 1, 2-5 models, 0-2 Units/Army, 0-6 Models/Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 40x40 mm, Ashes to Ashes, Fear, Fearless, Ghostly Form, Undead, Aegis (2+, against non-Magical Attacks), Aegis (5+)

unit.name: Wraiths
unit.description: Rea: 1, 5-10 models, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Ashes to Ashes, Fear, Fearless, Ghostly Form, Light Troops, Terror, Undead, Wizard Conclave, Aegis (3+, against non-Magical Attacks), Aegis (5+), Reaper, Great Weapon

unit.name: Spectral Hunters
unit.description: Rea: 1, 5-10 models, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base 25x50 mm, Ashes to Ashes, Fear, Fearless, Ghostly Form, Light Troops, Terror, Undead, Wizard Conclave, Aegis (3+, against non-Magical Attacks), Aegis (5+), Spectral Hunter: Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks, Great Weapon, Ghost Steed: Flaming Attacks, Harnessed

unit.name: Vampire Knights
unit.description: Rea: 1, Autonomous, Fear, Fearless, Scoring, Undead, Heavy Armour, Shield, Vampire Knight: Vampiric (6+), Lance, Undead Mount: Harnessed

equipment.name: Brotherhood of the Dragon: Devastating Charge + Plate Armour

unit.name: Vampire Spawn
unit.description: Rea: D3, 3-8 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Infantry, Base 40x40 mm, Autonomous, Fear, Fearless, Fly (9", 18"), Frenzy, Light Troops, Swiftstride, Undead, Battle Focus, Vampiric (6+)

unit.name: Varkolak
unit.description: Rea: 1, single model, 0-3 Units/Army Height Large, Type Beast, Base 50x50 mm, Autonomous, Fear, Fearless, Undead, Vanguard, Fortitude (4+), Hatred, Vampiric (3+)

unit.name: Winged Reapers
unit.description: Rea: D3, 2-4 models, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Infantry, Base 50x75 mm, Ashes to Ashes, Fear, Fearless, Fly (6", 12"), Light Troops, Necromantic Aura, Swiftstride, Undead, Lethal Strike

unit.name: Shrieking Horror
unit.description: Rea: 1, single model, 0-2 Units/Army*, Height Gigantic, Type Beast, Base 100x150 mm, Ashes to Ashes, Fearless, Fly (8", 16"), Light Troops, Undead, Fortitude (6+), Chilling Shriek, Harnessed

mount.name: Skeletal Steed
mount.description: Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base 25x50 mm, Ghost Step, Harnessed, Magical Attacks

mount.name: Spectral Steed
mount.description: Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base 25x50 mm, Fly (8", 16"), Ghost Step, Light Troops, Harnessed, Magical Attacks

mount.name: Cadaver Wagon
mount.description: Height Large, Type Construct, Base 60x100 mm, Necromantic Aura, No Rest for the Wicked, War Platform, Fortitude (4+), Shambling Horde: Harnessed, Chassis: Impact Hits (1), Inanimate

mount.name: Court of the Damned
Court of the Damned (Lamia)
mount.description: Height Large, Type Construct, Base 60x100 mm, Chill of the Grave, Fear, Ghost Step, Towering Presence, War Platform, Paramour (2): Vampiric (6+), Spectral Pallbearers: Harnessed, Magical Attacks, Chassis: Impact Hits (D6), Inanimate

mount.name: Shrieking Horror
mount.description: 0-1 Mounts/Army, Height Gigantic, Type Beast, Base 100x150 mm, Fly (8", 16"), Light Troops, Fortitude (5+), Chilling Shriek, Harnessed

mount.name: Monstrous Revenant
Monstrous Revenant (Great Monstrous Revenant)
mount.description: Height Large, Type Cavalry, Base 50x50 mm, Fear, Fly (8", 16"), Light Troops, Towering Presence, Harnessed, Lethal Strike, Poison Attacks

mount.name: Zombie Dragon
mount.description: 0-1 Mounts/Army, Height Gigantic, Type Beast, Base 50x100 mm, Fly (7", 14"), Light Troops, Distracting, Fortitude (6+), Breath Attack (Toxic Attacks), Harnessed

mount.name: Colossal Zombie Dragon
mount.description: 0-1 Mounts/Army, Height Gigantic, Type Beast, Base 100x150 mm, Fly (7", 14"), Light Troops, Distracting, Fortitude (6+), Breath Attack (Toxic Attacks), Harnessed

item.name: Master of Undeath
item.description: One Character in the Vampire Covenant army must be nominated to be the Master. At the start of the game, the General is always the Master.

item.name: Reanimated
item.description: Some unit profiles contain the additional Characteristic Reanimated, shortened Rea, which determines the number of Health Points Raised with Arise! (Hereditary Spell) and The Dead Arise (Bound Spell).

item.name: Ashes to Ashes
item.description: At the end of any phase in which the Master is removed as a casualty, every unit in the army with one or more models with Ashes to Ashes must pass a Discipline Test or lose a number of Health Points equal to the amount by which the test was failed, with no saves of any kind allowed. These Health Point losses are allotted following the rules for Unstable, except that they can never be allotted to models that do not have Ashes to Ashes. The number of Health Points lost is reduced by 1 if the unit is within range of Rally Around the Flag. At the end of the Player Turn in which the Master was removed as a casualty, a new Master may be selected. In order to do so, nominate a friendly Wizard Character that either has Vampiric or has chosen Evocation. This Character becomes the new Master. At the start of each friendly Player Turn after the armys Master has been removed as a casualty and no new Master has been selected, every unit with Ashes to Ashes must once again pass a Discipline Test or lose Health Points as described above.

item.name: Autonomous
item.description: Undead units consisting entirely of models with Autonomous may perform March Moves as normal, even when outside the range of Commanding Presence of any friendly models. The unit must still pass a Discipline Test in order to do so if within 8" of non-Fleeing enemy units.

item.name: Awaken
item.description: The model can Raise Health Points above a units starting size for the units stated within brackets. However, units cannot be increased beyond twice their starting size or beyond the maximum unit size written in their unit entry. A units starting size is the size of the unit as written on the Army List or the size of the unit when it is Summoned.

item.name: Gates of the Netherworld
item.description: Whenever a model with Gates of the Netherworld successfully casts Arise!, after resolving the spells effect, choose a friendly unit with a Reanimated value and within 12" of the Caster. This unit, or a single Character inside the unit, Raises 1 Health Point. No unit can be chosen more than twice per Magic Phase by Gates of the Netherworld.

item.name: Ghostly Form
item.description: The model gains Ghost Step and Magical Attacks. R&F models with Ghostly Formcan only be joined by Characters with Ghostly Form.

item.name: Necromantic Aura
item.description: All friendly units within 6" of one or more models with Necromantic Aura reduce the number of Health Point losses caused by Ashes to Ashes and Unstable by 1.

item.name: The Dead Arise
item.description: 0-1 per Army. The model can cast The Dead Arise as a Bound Spell with Power Level (4/8). The Dead Arise: Range 12", Type Ground, Duration Instant. Summon a unit listed in the Awaken (X) Universal Rule of the Caster (declare which before casting) with a number of Health Points corresponding to the Reanimated value of the unit. All models must be placed within the spells range, with at least one model touching the target point. All upgrades except Command Group Options are allowed. The unit loses Scoring (if it had it).

item.name: Unholy Appetite
item.description: Close Combat. After a Round of Combat in which at least one attack with Unholy Appetite caused an unsaved wound, all attacks with Unholy Appetite from models in the same unit must reroll failed to-hit rolls until the end of the next Player Turn.

item.name: Vampiric
item.description: Close Combat. At the end of each Melee Phase, check and resolve the following effects for all models with Vampiric: - Character - If at least one attack with Vampiric made by the Character caused an unsaved wound, the Character can make a single Vampiric roll. If successful, the Character Recovers a single Health Point. - R&F model - If at least one attack with Vampiric made by a R&F model in the unit caused an unsaved wound, the unit can make a single Vampiric roll. If successful, the unit Raises a single Health Point. - A Vampiric roll is successful if the D6 scores X+, where X is the number stated within brackets. Use only the best value if a unit or Character has multiple parts with this Attack Attribute that each caused unsaved wounds. A roll of 1 on a Vampiric roll is always a failure and a 6 is always a success. Models with Towering Presence suffer a −2 modifier to their Vampiric rolls.

item.name: Reaper
item.description: A unit consisting entirely of models on foot with Reaper ignores all other units when moving in the Movement Phase, but it must follow the Unit Spacing rule at the end of its move. The unit can make a Sweeping Attack. The enemy unit suffers 1 hit with Strength 5, Armour Penetration 10, and Magical Attacks for each model with Reaper in the unit.

item.name: Ancient Blood Power
item.description: Bloodline Vampire Counts can take the Ancient Blood Power of their Bloodline instead of taking a Blood Power. All Ancient Blood Powers are 0-1 per Army.

item.name: Blood Ties
item.description: Certain unit entries in this Army Book include the term Blood Ties, followed by the name of a Bloodline in brackets. If the army includes at least one Vampire Count or Vampire Courtier matching the Bloodline written in brackets in a unit entry, this unit gains access to the associated Blood Ties option.

item.name: Brotherhood of the Dragon Bloodline
item.description: The Vampire gains +2 Offensive Skill, Plate Armour, Weapon Master, and can take any number of Close Combat Weapons. Whenever possible, unless another model does so first: - The Vampire must accept a Duel. - The Vampire must issue a Duel. - Vampire Courtiers cannot be upgraded to Wizard Adepts. Vampire Counts cannot be upgraded to Wizard Masters. Blood Ties: Vampire Knights. The Vampires Path access is replaced with: Occultism.

item.name: Ancient Blood Power: Crimson Rage
Crimson Rage
item.description: Every unsaved wound caused by the Vampires Close Combat Attacks, before applying Multiple Wounds, generates another Close Combat Attack: - Allocate and resolve the new attacks before removing any casualties, in the same Initiative Step as the attacks that generated them. - You cannot generate more attacks than there were Health Points in the Health Pool towards which the initial attacks were allocated. - The new attacks do not generate any further attacks.

item.name: Von Karnstein Bloodline
item.description: The Vampire must reroll failed Vampiric rolls, and the presence of one or more Von Karnstein Vampires grants +1 to their sides Combat Score in any combat which they are Engaged in. Models in the same unit as a Von Karnstein Vampire gain Autonomous. If applicable, the ranges of Commanding Presence and Rally Around the Flag of Von Karnstein Vampires are increased by 6". Blood Ties: Dark Coach The Vampires Path access is replaced with: Evocation, Occultism.

item.name: Ancient Blood Power: Storm Caller
Storm Caller
item.description: All units within 12" of the Vampire gain Hard Target (1).

item.name: Lamia Bloodline
item.description: The Vampire gains Lightning Reflexes and suffers −1 Attack Value. Enemy units in base contact with one or more Lamia Vampires suffer −1 Agility. If the Vampire is not equipped with Heavy Armour and/or a Shield, it gains Distracting. Duels issued by the Vampire must (if possible) be accepted by a Character unless a Champion accepts first. Enemy model parts without Harnessed in a Duel with the Vampire suffer −1 Attack Value. Blood Ties: Court of the Damned The Vampires Path access is replaced with: Evocation, Witchcraft.

item.name: Ancient Blood Power: Commandment
Commandment
item.description: The Defensive Skill and Offensive Skill of R&F models in a unit joined by the Vampire are set to 6.

item.name: Strigoi Bloodline
item.description: The Vampire gains Fortitude (4+), Hatred, and +1 Health Point, cannot take a mount except for a Shrieking Horror, and may not be equipped with any kind of armour. Vampire Courtiers cannot be upgraded to Wizard Adepts. Vampire Counts cannot be upgraded to Wizard Masters. Blood Ties: Ghouls The Vampires Path access is replaced with: Shamanism.

item.name: Ancient Blood Power: Ghoul Lord
Ghoul Lord
item.description: The Vampire, its mount, and all R&F models in its unit gain Poison Attacks. If the unit it joins already had Poison Attacks, all R&F models in the unit wound automatically on a successful natural to-hit roll of 1 less than normal (i.e. 5+ instead of 6+).

item.name: Nosferatu Bloodline
item.description: The Vampire suffers −1 Attack Value, −2 Offensive Skill, and may not be equipped with Heavy Armour and/or a Shield. The Vampire gains Awaken (Skeletons, Zombies) and Gates of the Netherworld. A Vampire Courtier must be upgraded to Wizard Apprentice, Wizard Adept, or Wizard Master. A Vampire Count must be upgraded to Wizard Adept or Wizard Master. The Vampire always knows the Hereditary Spell in addition to its other spells. Blood Ties: Wraiths and Spectral Hunters The Vampires Path access is replaced with: Cosmology, Evocation, Occultism.

item.name: Ancient Blood Power: Blood Magic
Blood Magic
item.description: During Spell Selection, choose a Path (this may be a different Path than the one the model selects its spells from). When the Vampire or a friendly Wizard within 12" casts the Hereditary Spell or any spell from the chosen Path, the Casting Value of the Spell is reduced by 2, and when rolling casting rolls with a single Magic Dice, a natural roll of 1 or 2 on the Magic Dice is always a failed Casting Attempt, regardless of any modifiers. When the Vampire or a friendly Wizard within 12" Miscasts, it suffers a +1 Miscast Modifier.

item.name: Eternal Duellist
item.description: The Vampire must reroll natural to-hit and to-wound rolls of 1 with its Close Combat Attacks.

item.name: Monster Hunter
item.description: The Vampire gains Multiple Wounds (2, against Towering Presence).

item.name: Hour of the Wolf
item.description: The Vampires unit gains Swiftstride. The Vampire gains Awaken (Bat Swarms, Dire Wolves, Great Bats, Zombies).

item.name: Unbreakable Will
item.description: At the beginning of each Round of Combat, select a single friendly unit Engaged in the same Combat as the Vampire (this can be the Vampires own unit). This unit gains Stubborn until the end of the Melee Phase.

item.name: Mask of Innocence
item.description: Enemy units in base contact with one or more Vampires with the Mask of Innocence suffer −1 Discipline.

item.name: Mesmerising Gaze
item.description: The Vampire can cast Whispers of the Veil (Evocation) as a Bound Spell with Power Level (4/8).

item.name: Bestial Bulk
item.description: 0-1 per Army. Models on foot only. The Vampire gains +1 Resilience and cannot use any Weapon Enchantments or Armour Equipment. The Vampires Height is changed to Large and its base size to 40x40 mm. As long as the Vampire is joined to a unit of Ghasts, the Vampire gains Scoring. If playing Capture the Flags, the Vampire gains Scoring (no matter if joined to a unit of Ghasts or not).

item.name: Flying Horror
item.description: Models on foot only. The Vampire gains Fly (7", 14"), Light Troops, Storm of Wings (see Bat Swarms ), and Swiftstride.

item.name: Arcane Knowledge
item.description: Wizards only. The Vampire knows the Hereditary Spell in addition to its other spells. Spells cast by the Vampire gain +6" range. This effect is decreased to +3" range for Aura spells. Bound Spells and spells without range are not affected.

item.name: Forbidden Path
item.description: Wizard Adepts and Masters only. A Wizard Master with this Blood Power becomes a Wizard Adept using two different Paths it has access to (it knows 2 spells from each Path). A Wizard Adept becomes a Wizard Apprentice using two different Paths it has access to (it knows 1 spell from each Path). This Blood Power cannot be combined with Essence of a Free Mind.

item.name: Reapers Harvest
item.description: Enchantment: Hand Weapon. Attacks made with this weapon always have Strength 10 and Armour Penetration 10 and become Divine Attacks and Magical Attacks. When rolling to wound with attacks made with this weapon, use the enemys Discipline instead of its Resilience.

item.name: True Thirst
item.description: Vampire Counts and Courtiers only. Enchantment: Hand Weapon. Attacks made with this weapon gain +1 Strength, +1 Armour Penetration, and Vampiric (3+), and become Magical Attacks. For each unsaved wound caused by this weapon during a Melee Phase, Raise 1 Health Point of R&F models in the wielders unit at the end of the Melee Phase. The number of Raised Health Points in each phase cannot exceed the fixed component of the Reanimated value of the R&F models in the unit, disregarding any D3 or D6 parts (e.g. you can Raise 4 Zombies in a single phase).

item.name: Legend of the Black King
item.description: Enchantment: Heavy Armour and Plate Armour. The bearer gains +1 Armour and Aegis (4+).

item.name: Black Standard of Zagvozd
item.description: Barrow Guard and Barrow Knights only. Close Combat Attacks made by R&F model parts without Harnessed in the bearers unit gain +1 to hit. At the start of any Melee Phase, if the bearers unit is unengaged, you may choose a friendly Standard Height Infantry or Barrow Knight unit within 6" of the bearer. Close Combat Attacks made by R&F model parts without Harnessed in that unit gain +1 to hit until the end of the Melee Phase.

item.name: Hypnotic Pendant
item.description: The bearer gains Distracting. All Standard Height R&F models in the bearers unit gain Parry.

item.name: Eternity Gem
item.description: Vampire Counts and Courtiers on Monstrous Revenant or without Towering Presence only. Attacks against the bearers model with Lethal Strike and/or Multiple Wounds lose these Attack Attributes. One use only: Must be activated when the bearers model suffers the first wound in the game after Armour Saves. The bearers model gains Aegis (2+) against this wound.

item.name: Necromantic Staff
item.description: Dominant. Wizards only. The bearer gains Channel (1) and can cast the first Boosted version (6" Aura) of Arise! (Hereditary Spell) as a Bound Spell with Power Level (4/8).

item.name: Nights Crown
item.description: Standard Height models only. Close Combat Attacks allocated towards the bearers model do not gain Strength modifiers of the +X type conferred by Close Combat Weapons. Close Combat Attacks can never wound the bearers model on better than 4+.

item.name: Unholy Tome
item.description: Dominant. Wizards only. The bearer can cast Danse Macabre (Evocation) as a Bound Spell with Power Level (4/8).

item.name: Cursed Medallion
item.description: Right before the battle (during step 7 of the Deployment Phase Sequence), choose a Character, Champion, or a single model unit on the opponents Army List. The bearer must reroll failed to-hit and towound rolls against the chosen model.

item.name: Chill of the Grave
item.description: Universal Rule. Enemy units within 6" of one or more models with Chill of the Grave suffer -2 Agility and -2 Defensive Skill.

item.name: Chilling Shriek
item.description: Special Attack. A model with this Special Attack can use it as 1. a Shooting Attack, and as 2. a Special Attack when Engaged in Combat. - 1. Choose a target using the normal rules for Shooting Attacks. The attack has Range 8" and March and Shoot. - 2. The attack is made at the model parts Agility. Declare that you are using Chilling Shriek when allocating attacks. If used, the model part cannot perform any Close Combat Attacks. Choose a single unit in base contact as the target. - Regardless of whether it is used as a Shooting or Melee Attack, the Chilling Shriek inflicts 1 hit for each Health Point the model with Chilling Shriek currently has. These hits always have Strength 10, Armour Penetration 10, and Magical Attacks. When rolling to wound with this attack, use the enemys Discipline instead of its Resilience.

item.name: Great Monstrous Revenant
MR: Great Monstrous Revenant
item.description: Universal Rule. The Monstrous Revenant gains Devastating Charge (+1 Str, +1 AP) and its base size is changed to 60x100 mm.

item.name: Unliving Shield
item.description: Universal Rule. Enemy models cannot allocate Close Combat Attacks towards a Necromancer as long as they can allocate attacks towards a model with Unliving Shield in the same unit as the Necromancer. This rule cannot be used if there are also models with Vampiric in the same unit as the Necromancer.

item.name: Wail of Woe
item.description: Special Attack. A model with this Special Attack can use it as 1. a Shooting Attack, and as 2. a Special Attack when Engaged in Combat. - 1. Choose a target using the normal rules for Shooting Attacks. The attack has Range 8", March and Shoot, and inflicts D6+2 hits with Strength 4, Armour Penetration 1, and Magical Attacks. - 2. The attack is made at the model parts Agility. Declare that you are using Wail of Woe when allocating attacks. If used, the model part cannot perform any Close Combat Attacks. Choose a single unit in base contact as the target. The target unit suffers D3+1 hits with Strength 4, Armour Penetration 1, and Magical Attacks.

item.name: First Raised
item.description: Universal Rule. Ghoul Champions gain Swift Reform.

item.name: Storm of Wings
item.description: Universal Rule. Enemy units in base contact with one or more models with Storm of Wings suffer -1 Offensive Skill and -1 Defensive Skill.

item.name: No Rest for the Wicked
item.description: Universal Rule. All R&F models in friendly units within 6" gain Fortitude (6+). Ghasts in friendly units within 6" gain Fortitude (4+) instead. In addition, all R&F models in friendly units that count towards Core within 6" of one or more Cadaver Wagons gain Fortitude (+1, max. 5+) during their First Round of Combat.

item.name: Unholy Conduit
item.description: Universal Rule. Friendly units within 6" gain Autonomous

item.name: Extended Chassis
item.description: Universal Rule. The Dark Coachs base size is changed to 50x150 mm, and its Undead Mounts Attack Value is set to 2.

item.name: Aura of Undeath
item.description: Special Attack. During its Shooting Phase, the model part can make a Shooting Attack that targets all enemy units within 12" of the model (including those Engaged in Combat and outside Front Arc and/or Line of Sight). This attack can be used even if the Altar is Engaged in Combat. The targets suffer D6 hits with a Strength equal to the current Game Turn number and Armour Penetration 2.

item.name: Lash of Souls
item.description: Universal Rule. The model can cast Pentagram of Pain (Occultism) as a Bound Spell with Power Level (4/8).

item.name: Brotherhood of the Dragon: Devastating Charge + Plate Armour
item.description: Must be selected for Blood Ties (Brotherhood of the Dragon).

rule.name: VC#61
rule.leftTerm: Brotherhood of the Dragon: Devastating Charge + Plate Armour
